message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking $20,000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, I am only able to offer $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $18,000 for this product. It really is top-of-the-line. What do you say?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm willing to go up to $16,000 for this product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
